price: 然后，有人要对不义的人们说：“你们尝试永久的刑罚吧！你们只因自己的谋求而受报酬。”
arabic: ثُمَّ قِيلَ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ هَلۡ تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: thumma qīla lilladhīna ẓalamū dhūqū ʿadhāba al-khul'di hal tuj'zawna illā bimā kuntum taksibūna
